title: #61b: But Wait, There's More (Patrick Coppolino, Manolis Zontanos, Ari Shaffir)
itunes:title: But Wait, There's More with Patrick Coppolino, Manolis Zontanos - Part 2
description: Patrick Coppolino comes back to my hotel room after our secret show in a Toronto pot room and we talk about some of the things he managed to forget during the first podcast. Manolis Zontanos is there to help the story along, too. He was the only one who hadn't been smoking because of how he still lives with his parents because he smoked before.
